title: Alice in the Country of Joker: Circus and Liarâ€™s Game, Vol. 1
description: Just when Alice was getting used to life in Wonderland, a wild card appears that changes the enigmatic Joker. Now the dangers are even greater as Alice must dodge bullets and stave off psychopathic suitors while the seasons cycle at random and can be changed by a mere thought. The Circus is a place of mystery, and its warden, the two-faced Joker, as cryptic plans of his own. But what are they? Welcome to the Circus. You won't be leaving... ever.
author: QuinRose
